ref.Programmability.CreateCommand:
CREATE FUNCTION [sbor].[StateUnderProgram8] (@id int,@DocType VARCHAR(128),@IDMainGoal int) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN (
WITH Q (id,idParent,caption,[level]) AS ( SELECT SPSGE.id,SPSGE.idParent,SG.caption ,CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SG.idParent order by SG.caption) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) --AS orderliness FROM ref.SystemGoal as SG INNER JOIN tp.StateProgram_SystemGoalElement AS SPSGE -- ТЧ «Элементы СЦ» ON SPSGE.idSystemGoal = SG.id INNER JOIN doc.StateProgram AS SP ON SP.id = SPSGE.idOwner INNER JOIN ref.DocType AS DT --поле «Тип утверждающего документа» Подпрограмма ГП ON DT.id = SG.idDocType_CommitDoc WHERE SPSGE.idParent = @IDMainGoal --для получения корневых елемнтов дерева AND SPSGE.IsMainGoal = 0 --у которых флаг «Основная цель» = Ложь AND SP.id = @id AND DT.Caption = @DocType UNION ALL SELECT SPSGE.id,SPSGE.idParent,SG.caption,CAST([level] AS VARCHAR(MAX))+'.'+CAST((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SG.idParent order by SG.caption)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) -- FROM ref.SystemGoal AS SG INNER JOIN tp.StateProgram_SystemGoalElement AS SPSGE ON SPSGE.idSystemGoal = SG.id INNER JOIN doc.StateProgram AS SP ON SP.id = SPSGE.idOwner INNER JOIN ref.DocType AS DT ON DT.id = SG.idDocType_CommitDoc INNER JOIN Q ON SPSGE.idParent = Q.id --WHERE SPSG.IsMainGoal IS NULL AND ETSG.Caption = @Type )
SELECT (Q.[level] +' '+ Q.caption ) AS NumberName ,GI.Caption AS GoalIndicator ,UD.Caption AS Measure ,YEAR(HP.DateEnd) AS NumYear ,SPGIV.Value AS GIValue
FROM Q LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_GoalIndicator AS SPGI ON Q.id = SPGI.idMaster LEFT JOIN ref.GoalIndicator AS GI ON GI.id = SPGI.idGoalIndicator LEFT JOIN ref.UnitDimension AS UD ON UD.id = GI.idUnitDimension LEFT JOIN tp.StateProgram_GoalIndicator_Value AS SPGIV ON SPGIV.idMaster = SPGI.id LEFT JOIN ref.HierarchyPeriod AS HP ON HP.id = SPGIV.idHierarchyPeriod )
